articles.author: Tina Nguyen
articles.content:
So what was it like, I asked, when he took off the scarf and put on a plain mask, and looked like just another Asian dude? 
Ive been on the streets in New York and on the subways any number of times… [+5870 chars]
articles.description: He’s been trying to transcend his identity his entire life. Now, to be mayor of New York, he just might need to embrace it.
articles.title: Andrew Yang’s Asian American Superpower - POLITICO

articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.content: MANILA - A US navy destroyer sunk during World War II and lying nearly 6,500 meters below sea level off the Philippines has been reached in the world's deepest shipwreck dive, an American exploration… [+1692 chars]
articles.description: A US navy destroyer sunk during World War II and lying nearly 6,500 meters below sea level off the Philippines has been reached in the world's deepest shipwreck dive, an American exploration team said.
articles.title: 'Deepest wreck dive' reaches US WWII ship off Philippines - ABS-CBN News

articles.description: A couple in South Korea accused of damaging artwork by American graffiti artist JonOne said they had mistakenly thought they were allowed to daub paint on the piece as “participatory art”, the head of the exhibition said on Friday. The 240cm by 700cm untitled…
articles.title: Couple in Seoul paints over $672k graffiti artwork, says they mistook it for 'participatory art' - AsiaOne

articles.author: Chelsea Janes
articles.content: Washington: US Major League Baseball announced on Friday (Saturday AEDT) that it will be moving this years All-Star Game from Atlanta in response to the recent passage of Georgias sweeping voting law… [+2186 chars]
articles.description: “Major League Baseball fundamentally supports voting rights for all Americans,” said MLB commissioner Rob Manfred, following discussions with the baseball clubs and players.
articles.title: Major League Baseball to move All-Star Game from Atlanta in protest against Georgia voting law - Sydney Morning Herald
